title: 2001 - Space Odyssey
description: Humanity finds a musterious, obviously arificial object buried beneath the Lunar surface and, with the intelligent computer H.A.L. 9000, sets off on a quest.

title: Monsieur Hulot
description: Monsieur Hulot comes to a beachside hotel for a vacation, where he accidentally  (but good-naturedly) causes havoc

title: Alien
description: The commercial vessel Nostromo receives a distress call from an unexplored planet. After seaching for survivors, the crew heads home only to realize that a deadly bioform has joined them.
